m_szDocTitle: Hyundai and Linde Bringing Fuel Cell Carsharing to Germany
m_szDocSumamry: Hyundai and Linde Bringing Fuel Cell Carsharing to Germany Hyundai has partnered with hydrogen fueling supplier Linde Group to bring the BeeZero carsharing program to Germany. BeeZero will roll out 50 Hyundai ix35 Fuel Cell vehicles this summer in Munich. The campaign hopes to bring support for hydrogen fuel cell vehicles as a zero emission vehicle; and, itâ€™s the first carsharing program that includes fuel cell vehicles, according to Hyundai.
